body:
I've just started running minecraft on a RAMDrive to supposedly increase FPS. However, I've encountered a problem. For some reason every time I log on to Minecraft supposedly more files are being created because the available space on my harddisk ramdrive thing is getting smaller and smaller. I was hoping someone could explain to me what the problem is and how to fix it! 

Pce :^)

title: Help!
